QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(replace(n.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, n.biomarker, n.note_date, isnull(n.biomarker_status, '') + ';' + isnull(n.variation_detail, '') + ';' + isnull(n.biomarker, '') as VALUE_AS_STRING, 'oncology' source_type from {sc}.nlp_biomarkers n JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND n.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by cast(replace(n.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
